channel.title: Games on ETdoFresh
channel.description: Recent content in Games on ETdoFresh

item.title: Guerra
item.description: Guerra is Spanish for War! This was the title of a childhood game that I used to play with my friends. It was a mixture between action and the game of Memory.

item.title: Intro to Cannon Fodder Clone
item.description: One of my favorite PC Games was Cannon Fodder. The mixture between a point-and-click adventure game and top-down action game was a home run in my eyes.

item.title: Pacman XNA C#
item.description: This was my first and last XNA project. It’s not because I didn’t love XNA, it is very cool and very fast! But as an independent/sole developer, the time it took me to get to this point was too long. I realized I had to go to another tool like GameMaker or Unity.

item.title: Intro to Water Balloon Boys
item.description:
http://www.etdofresh.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/11/WaterGunBoyzDemo.mp4

Water Balloon Boys is an action adventure game that I have been wanting to create. It’s a game where Angry Bird meets an Action Game. The player takes control of a kid who can throw water balloons by winding his arm back, and letting the balloon fly!

Here’s a version of the game I tried to create in the past for a 48 hour video game competition.
